item.title: Quality Assurance Engineer & Technical Docs Writer (san mateo)
item.description:
Quality Assurance Engineer & Technical Docs Writer


About Us:
Appirio (www.appirio.com) delivers products and professional services that help medium and large enterprises accelerate their adoption of on-demand solutions. Founded in October of 2006, we are the fastest growing Salesforce.com and Google Enterprise partner, have secured a strategic investment from Salesforce.com and completed additional rounds of funding from Sequoia Capital and GGV Capital.

Appirio has a proven track record of designing and implementing complex and mission-critical systems using Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solutions. Since our founding we have secured over 120 enterprise customers including Qualcomm, Dolby, Starbucks, VM Ware, Applied Bio, Genentech, and many more. We also have over 2,500 customers using our cloud products that integrate and/or leverage technologies from Google, Salesforce.com, Amazon.com and Adobe.

Candidate Profile
Appirio is looking for a broadly skilled person who can work in a start-up environment on our Services Management product (http://appirio.com/products/servicesmanagement.php) and other offerings. You will have the opportunity to drive quality assurance and technical documentation for products running in the cloud. As a result we need people who can drive the creation of automated testing of the business layer and help create a whole product that takes advantages of cloud computing concepts (single multi-tenant version delivered entirely over the Internet). Demonstrated success with this product offering can result in leading QA / Doc across our product portfolio.

If you are excited as we are about cloud computing and looking to build innovative applications on the leading SaaS platforms, Appirio may be the place for you. We expect everyone in our company to exhibit integrity, intelligence and an impressive breadth of skills. Our work requires Appirio employees to effectively engage at both the business and technical level. We are looking for people with:

 Passion for quality assurance of end-user applications as well as technical writing
 Enthusiastic, professional, and confident personality; driven by cool technology, customer success with a team player attitude
 Strong communications skills to fully understand customer requirements and translate them into a plan of action
 Technical acumen to help convert plans into real solutions that work
 Passion for technology and providing valuable, usable products to customers via the SaaS model


Skills & Experience
 Be a part of a Scrum team responsible for QA & documentation of a specific SaaS product offering
 Experience working on Agile Scrum teams
 Working knowledge of some or all of the following quality assurance methods: unit, integration, regression, user interface automated testing
 Manage testing life cycle for a specific SaaS product offering
 Develop automated custom QA testing plans for applications written in APEX and Visual Force or (Java/PLSQL and PHP or JSP)
 Diagnose, report, track and resolve quality issues for a specific SaaS product offering
 Work with an offshore team to execute test scripts, plans, and create tools
 Responsible for all documentation or collateral for a specific product (installation guides, user guides, release notes, etc)
 Utilize a variety of web 2.0 technologies to deliver documentation and collateral (web solutions, video clips, etc)
 Ability to solve problems creatively and work at both detailed and abstract levels
 Comfort working in a distributed team
 A minimum of two years of commercial software development, QA or IT industry experience
 Experience delivering end user product content over the web
 Ability to communicate clearly in writing, by phone, and in person
 Experience with one or more web platforms such as Google, Salesforce.com, Amazon, etc

Education
 BS/CS, IS or equivalent from top tier university
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Salary and Benefits
 Comprehensive health plan through BlueShield, MetLife and VSP including medical, dental, and vision coverage (full-time employees only)
 Short-term and Long-term Disability Plans
 Life Insurance
 Flexible Spending Plans (Medical and Dependent Care)
 401k
 Employee Assistance Program
 Salary and bonus structures based on experience
 Position will be based in San Mateo, CA

Next Steps
 Submit your resume and cover letter to Appirio at careers@appirio.com
 Successful candidates will be interviewed via telephone, then in person


Principals only. Recruiters please don't contact this job poster.
